Synopsis: Gets the global TCP/IP offload settings.
Description: The Get-NetOffloadGlobalSetting cmdlet gets the global TCP/IP offload settings. These settings include Receive Side Scaling, Receive Segment Coalescing, task offload, and NetworkDirect.

Examples.Title: Example 1: Get global TCP/IP offload settings
Examples.Code:
PS C:\>Get-NetOffloadGlobalSetting
This command gets the global TCP/IP offload settings on the computer.
